ActJudges Act
SubjectJoan Frances Davis Robinson ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Robert Robinson
PrecisGranting of an annuity to JOAN FRANCES DAVIS ROBINSON, widow of the Hon. Robert Robinson, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective December 9, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
